name: 7th International Conference on Inventive Systems and Control
content: This 7th International Conference on Inventive Systems and Control \[ICISC 2023\] invites novel and unpublished research contributions that address the existing challenges and/or showcase the state-of-the-art real-world applications and enabling innovative technological advancements of Artificial Intelligence \[AI\], Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Intelligent Control.
organizers: JCT College of Engineering and Technology
